title: State Agency OKs New Pollution-Scrubbing Technology (The Port of Long Beach)
text: ( Source : The Port of Long Beach ) The California Air Resources Board has approved a new technology by a Carson-based company that uses specialized barges which connect to the exhaust ports of container ships to scrub pollution. In 2013, the
